name: Hot Chocolate Truffles
author: Reddi-wip
summary: Hot chocolate truffles are made with NILLA® wafers, dark chocolate cocoa mix, pudding, Reddi-wip and marshmallows rolled and coated with melted white morsels.
ingredients: 3 (.96 ounce) envelopes Swiss Miss® Simply Cocoa Dark Chocolate Hot Cocoa Mix
1 (3.25 ounce) cup Snack Pack® Chocolate Pudding
½ cup Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping
directions: Line shallow baking pan with parchment paper; set aside
Place wafers and cocoa mix in food processor bowl; pulse wafers into fine crumbs
Add pudding and Reddi-wip; pulse until mixture comes together and forms a ball
Add marshmallows; pulse until marshmallows are cut into small pieces
Roll wafer mixture into 1-inch balls; place on pan
Place morsels and oil in small microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds more or until softened; stir until mixture is melted completely
Roll a truffle in mixture until evenly coated
Remove with fork, letting excess drip off
Immediately sprinkle with some colored sugar, if desired
Store in airtight container in refrigerator
